nodes.documentation:
Creates a token object which points to the token on the Ethereum blockchain using 
the token's contract address. The constructor also assigns the owner of the contract
to be the address from the the transaction originated.

    * @param _tokenAddress - The address of the token which will be getting airdropped. 
@param _owner - The wallet address of the owner of the contract.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Address and value arrays must be of the same length"

arguments.value: Address and value arrays must be of the same length

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Address and value arrays must be of the same length"

nodes.documentation:
Allows the owner to airdrop tokens to multiple recipients were each recipient can receive
a different amounts of tokens. 

    * @param _recipientAddresses - The wallet addresses of the recipients.
@param _tokensToSend - The corresponding amounts of tokens to send to each recipient.
nodes.name: multiValueAirdrop

nodes.documentation:
Allows the owner to airdrop tokens to multiple recipients were each recipient receives 
the same amount of tokens. 

    * @param _recipientAddresses - The wallet addresses of the recipients.
@param _tokensToSend - The total amount of tokens to send to all recipients.
nodes.name: singleValueAirdrop
withdrawTokens

nodes.documentation:
Allows anyone to query the address of the token which the airdrop 
contract will be distributing.*
nodes.name: getTokenAddress

nodes.documentation:
Creates a token object which points to the token on the Ethereum blockchain using 
the token's contract address. The constructor also assigns the owner of the contract
to be the address from the the transaction originated.

    * @param _tokenAddress - The address of the token which will be getting airdropped. 
@param _owner - The wallet address of the owner of the contract.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Address and value arrays must be of the same length"

arguments.value: Address and value arrays must be of the same length

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Address and value arrays must be of the same length"

nodes.documentation:
Allows the owner to airdrop tokens to multiple recipients were each recipient can receive
a different amounts of tokens. 

    * @param _recipientAddresses - The wallet addresses of the recipients.
@param _tokensToSend - The corresponding amounts of tokens to send to each recipient.
nodes.name: multiValueAirdrop

nodes.documentation:
Allows the owner to airdrop tokens to multiple recipients were each recipient receives 
the same amount of tokens. 

    * @param _recipientAddresses - The wallet addresses of the recipients.
@param _tokensToSend - The total amount of tokens to send to all recipients.
nodes.name: singleValueAirdrop
withdrawTokens

nodes.documentation:
Allows anyone to query the address of the token which the airdrop 
contract will be distributing.*
nodes.name: getTokenAddress

params._owner: - The wallet address of the owner of the contract.
params._tokenAddress: - The address of the token which will be getting airdropped.

params._recipientAddresses: - The wallet addresses of the recipients.
params._tokensToSend: - The corresponding amounts of tokens to send to each recipient.

params._recipientAddresses: - The wallet addresses of the recipients.
params._tokensToSend: - The total amount of tokens to send to all recipients.

params._newOwner: - The address of the new owner.

params._recipientAddress: - The address to send the tokens to.
params._tokensToWithdraw: - The total amount of tokens to withdraw.

assignOwner(address).notice: Initializes the owner variable with an address (can only be invoked once).

methods.constructor: Creates a token object which points to the token on the Ethereum blockchain using  the token's contract address. The constructor also assigns the owner of the contract to be the address from the the transaction originated.

getOwner().notice: Returns the ETH address of the owner of any contract which  inherits this contract.

getTokenAddress().notice: Allows anyone to query the address of the token which the airdrop  contract will be distributing.*

multiValueAirdrop(address[],uint256[]).notice: Allows the owner to airdrop tokens to multiple recipients were each recipient can receive a different amounts of tokens.

singleValueAirdrop(address[],uint256).notice: Allows the owner to airdrop tokens to multiple recipients were each recipient receives  the same amount of tokens.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows the current owner of the contract and all contracts  which inherit this contract to transfer ownership to another  ETH address. This function can only be invoked by the owner  of the contract.

withdrawTokens(address,uint256).notice: Allows the owner to withdraw tokens from the Airdrop contract.
